attributes.action: Put Brexit “on hold” till Covid is more under control
attributes.additional_details: It doesn’t make sense to be putting so many resources into a Brexit deal in the face of the COVID crisis, the government needs to reallocate those resources properly
attributes.background: Agree some words with our European partners to pause the Brexit negotiations.

rejection.details:
The UK left the EU on 31 January 2020. The transition period agreed between the UK and EU will end 31 December 2020. The UK Government cannot "pause" this itself, and any extension to the transition period would need to be agreed between the UK and EU.

We have accepted the following petition, which you might like to sign: 

To Seek a 1 year Extension to the Brexit Transition Period & a Second Referendum: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554492
